name: Spirit & Mind
description:
Spirit & Mind is a puzzle game similar to the game Mastermind or Wordle concept.
You have to guess the target sequence which consists of 3 notes chosen from 7 possible notes with repetitions allowed.

 

 

Controls
  • A - Play Note A
  • B - Play Note B
  • C - Play Note C
  • D - Play Note D
  • E - Play Note E
  • F - Play Note F
  • G - Play Note G
  • Mouse - Reveal Hidden Orbs
  • Left Click - Capture Hidden Orbs

 

Tutorial Video (TL;DR)

YouTube Video Tutorial (2 mins)

 

How To Play? Step 1

Guess a sequence of 3 notes combination out of A, B, C, D, E, F and G.

Step 2

Find and capture the hidden orbs from the resonated orbit.
They are the hints!

Step 3

Analyse the hints. Order of the hints does not matter.

Green - A Correct Note and Correct Position
Yellow - A Correct Note but Wrong Position
Grey - A Wrong Note

Final Step

Repeat until you successfully guess the target sequence!

Challenge yourself to complete with as few attempts as possible! 
You may use the shape and the sound of the target orbit to guide you.
